title.en: Bokura wa Yarimakuru, Kimochi Ii kara.

altTitles.ja: (C90) 僕らはヤりまくる、気持ちいいから。

altTitles.ja-ro: Bokura wa Yarimakuru, Kimochi Ii kara.

altTitles.en: We Fuck like Rabbits, Just Cause It Feels So Good!

description.en:
My school is just full of the cutest girls in the country. Obviously, this is suspicious.
They've all got crazy huge tits and asses, too. These girls are hotter than any idol,

Well, there's a reason for all of that. My school is a place where powerful men go to find young, pretty, adorable girls to use in any way that pleases them... and beyond their nice exteriors, all my classmates are huge sluts!

Senpai, kouhai, it doesn't matter -- I can't just let them all fall prey to weird old men! Because I'm going to make them all MINE instead!

One year later, and the work is done. The girls are mine. I've impregnated my classmates, harassed the girls in my club, made the student council president into my dick sheathe... it's the school life I've always dreamed of!

(Source: DLsite)

Takes place in the same universe as another work from the doujin circle Aomizuan: Yatara Hatsuiku no Ii Joshi Kougakusei to Itsudemo Daredemo Kozukuri SEX Dekiru Gakkou (やたら発育のいい女子○学生といつでも誰でも子作りSEXできる学校)
